ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] High Level Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: i dunno, at least on saryrn pickup groups in the mid 50 s still seem to be fairly competent.  karnors sucks for exp, btw, you know that most of the mobs in
ygData.messageBody:
i dunno, at least on saryrn pickup groups in the mid 50's still seem to be fairly
competent. karnors sucks for exp, btw, you know that most of the mobs in
there range from 39 to the low 40's right? i'd suggest parking your bard in
sebilis and trying to get a group, and if that doesn't work, play your alt.

if you only want to group with guild members then yes, you will have to join
a large guild if you expect to have a guild group every time you want to play.
however, as the guild gets larger, there are more and more people who aren't
all that good players in it as well, so at some point, you might as well just
join pickup groups, hehehehe.

At 09:34 AM 3/5/01 -0500, you wrote:
>While not a bard related question, this seems like a good place to get some
>feedback on this.
>Elfson is 52 now (would be pretty far into it too, cept for 2 unrezzed death
>this weekend, ugh). I recently left my small, "family" guild (it was
>disbanding due to loss of many players). I joined a smallish (12-20 people
>on during prime play, almost all 45+) guild where some of my other former
>guild mates had gone. I like almost everyone in the new guild, but I'm not
>thrilled with the way the guild does some things (I don't want to get into
>specifics because there are a few Veeshan bards here and don't want to start
>any trouble). However, I basically only get to do things with guildies once
>at week at most, so essentially I'm still stuck in the same problem (I end
>up in pick up groups in Karnors most nights) I had in my family guild. (I
>was the highest lvl in the guild when I left).
>
>So what should I do? Leave the guild and try to join a big powerful guild
>(where I won't like many of the people, but at least I'll be able to do
>guild stuff most of the time I play)? Pretty much give up being able to
>play after 50, and just play my cleric in my Thrusday night group (39 now)?
>Something else?
>
>Elfson Allegro 52 Veeshan
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
>Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
